name: Chromalgama
description:
Play Chromalgama, top-down action space shooter, based on 2022 sci-fi novel, Salt of the Earth! Features:

- Large space battles in LAN multiplayer with AI-controlled ships

- 14 very distinct vessels - from 15 meters-long fighter craft to kilometer-long battleships

- Illustrated encyclopedia with over 40 lore entries

- Seamless crossplatform multiplayer integration

Work in progress:

- Campaign mode
